# additionalTrailingNavigationBarButtonItems

**Instance Property**

Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the trailing side of its navigation bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var additionalTrailingNavigationBarButtonItems: [UIBarButtonItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Actions triggered by these items don’t have any access to the browser’s content or to the URLs of selected items. Use these bar button items for global actions only (actions that don’t affect a specific document or folder).



## Modifying the browser’s appearance

- **browserUserInterfaceStyle**: The visual style for the document browser.
- **UIDocumentBrowserViewController.BrowserUserInterfaceStyle**: Styles that define the document browser’s appearance.
- **additionalLeadingNavigationBarButtonItems**: Additional bar button items that the document browser displays on the leading side of its navigation bar.
- **shouldShowFileExtensions**: A Boolean value that determines whether the browser always shows file extensions.
- **localizedCreateDocumentActionTitle**: The title for the Create Document button.
- **defaultDocumentAspectRatio**: The aspect ratio for the Create Document button.
